00051 #include <cctype>
00052 
00053 #include <trex/utils/TREXversion.hh>
00054 #include <trex/agent/Agent.hh>
00055 #include <trex/agent/StepClock.hh>
00056 
00057 using namespace TREX::agent;
00058 using namespace TREX::utils;
00059 using namespace TREX::transaction;
00060 
00061 namespace {
00063   SingletonUse<LogManager> s_log;
00064 
00071   void printHelp() {
00072     std::cout<<"Options:\n"
00073             <<"  Q :- quit\n"
00074             <<"  N :- next tick\n"
00075             <<"  G :- goto tick (e.g. g100)\n"
00076             <<"  P :- post the goals from the attached file\n"
00077             <<"       (e.g P goal.req)\n"
00078             <<"  K :- kill one reactor (e.g K foo)\n"      
00079             // <<"  W :- wrap the agent to tick 0\n"
00080             <<"  H :- print this help message"
00081             <<std::endl;
00082   }
00083 
00107   bool parseGoals(Agent &trex, std::string const &name) {
00108     bool found;
00109     std::string file = s_log->locate(name, found);
00110 
00111     if( !found ) {
00112       // try to add the .req extension
00113       file = s_log->use(name+".req", found);
00114     } else {
00115       s_log->use(file, found);
00116     }
00117 
00118     if( !found ) {
00119       std::cerr<<"Unable to locate file \""<<name<<"\""<<std::endl;
00120       return false;
00121     } else {
00122       try {
00123        std::cout<<"Loading \""<<file<<"\"... "<<std::flush;
00124        rapidxml::file<> xml_f(file.c_str());
00125        rapidxml::xml_document<> doc;
00126        doc.parse<0>(xml_f.data());
00127        rapidxml::xml_node<> *root = doc.first_node();
00128        if( NULL==root ) {
00129          std::cout<<"empty file"<<std::endl;
00130        } else {
00131          std::cout<<"done\nExtracting goals:"<<std::endl;
00132          ext_iterator iter(*root);
00133          trex.sendRequests(iter);
00134        }
00135        return true;
00136       }catch( rapidxml::parse_error const &xe ) {
00137        std::cerr<<"XML error on "<<xe.where<char>()
00138                <<": "<<xe.what()<<std::endl;
00139       }catch(Exception const &te) {
00140        std::cerr<<"TREX error "<<te<<std::endl;
00141       }catch( std::exception const &e ) {
00142        std::cerr<<"exception: "<<e.what()<<std::endl;
00143       } catch(...) {
00144        std::cerr<<"Unknown error"<<std::endl;
00145       }
00146       return false;
00147     }
00148   }
00149 }
00150 
00190 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00191   std::cout<<"This is TREX v"<<TREX::version::str()<<std::endl;
00192 
00193   if( argc<2 || argc>4 ) {
00194     std::cerr << "Invalid argument list:"
00195              <<"\n Usage: "<<argv[0]<<" configFile [steps]"
00196              << std::endl;
00197     return -1;
00198   }
00199   char *configFile = argv[1];
00200   std::auto_ptr<Clock> clk;
00201 
00202   if( argc>=3 )
00203     clk.reset(new StepClock(0, string_cast<size_t>(argv[2])));
00204   Agent agent(configFile, clk.release());
00205   agent.setClock(new StepClock(0, 60));
00206   agent.initComplete();
00207   printHelp();
00208   while( true ) {
00209     if( agent.missionCompleted() ) {
00210       std::cout<<"Mission completed."<<std::endl;
00211       break;
00212     }
00213     TICK tick = agent.getCurrentTick();
00214     std::cout<<'['<<agent.getName()<<':'<<tick<<"]> ";
00215     std::string cmdString;
00216     std::cin>>cmdString;
00217 
00218     char const cmd = std::toupper(cmdString[0]);
00219     try {
00220       if( 'Q'==cmd ) {
00221        std::cout<<"Goodbye"<<std::endl;
00222        break;
00223       } else if( 'N'==cmd ) {
00224        while( agent.getCurrentTick()==tick && !agent.missionCompleted() )
00225          agent.doNext();
00226       } else if( 'G'==cmd ) {
00227        try {
00228          TICK targetTick = string_cast<TICK>(cmdString.substr(1));
00229          
00230          if( targetTick<=tick ) 
00231            std::cout<<"Tick "<<targetTick<<" is in the past."
00232                    // <<"\nYou can use W to wrap the agent to its initial tick."
00233                    <<std::endl;
00234          else {
00235            while( agent.getCurrentTick()<targetTick &&
00236                  !agent.missionCompleted() )
00237              agent.doNext();
00238          }  
00239        }catch(bad_string_cast const &e) {
00240          std::cout<<"Ill-formed g command"<<std::endl;
00241        }
00242       } else if( 'P'==cmd ) {
00243        std::string file;
00244        std::cin>>file;
00245        while( !file.empty() && std::isspace(file[0]) )
00246          file = file.substr(1);
00247        if( file.empty() ) {
00248          std::cerr<<"Missing file name"<<std::endl;
00249          printHelp();
00250        } else if( !parseGoals(agent, file) ) 
00251          printHelp();
00252       } else if( 'K'==cmd ) {
00253        std::string name;
00254        std::cin>>name;
00255        while( !name.empty() && std::isspace(name[0]) )
00256          name = name.substr(1);
00257        if( name.empty() ) {
00258          std::cerr<<"Missing reactor name"<<std::endl;
00259          printHelp();
00260        } else {
00261          Agent::reactor_iterator pos = agent.find_reactor(name);
00262          if( agent.reactor_end()==pos ) 
00263            std::cerr<<"Reactor \""<<name<<"\" not found."<<std::endl;
00264          else {
00265            agent.kill_reactor(*pos);
00266            std::cout<<"Reactor \""<<name<<"\" killed."<<std::endl;
00267          }
00268        }
00269       } else 
00270        printHelp();
00271     } catch( std::exception const & e) {
00272       std::cout<<"Caught an exception :"<<e.what()<<std::endl;
00273       break;
00274     } catch( ... ) {
00275       std::cout<<"Caught an unknown exception"<<std::endl;
00276       break;
00277     }
00278   }
00279   return 0;
00280 }
